mapper.select: select distinct sender from message_table where receiver = #{receiver}
select sender, receiver, contents, senddate, readcheck as readCheck from message_table where sender = #{receiver} or receiver = #{receiver} order by senddate asc
mapper.insert: insert into message_table (no, contents, senddate, readcheck, sender, receiver) values (message_seq.nextval, #{contents}, sysdate, 'N', #{sender}, #{receiver})
